Talk_010:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM_00>Oh! I didn't expect to find you here.<sp:5:0:0> I see
you rushed off to these Zonai Ruins ahead
of us researchers.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>We came when we saw what looked like
lightning striking this dragon statue. I'm
glad to see you weren't hurt.
Talk_011:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM_00>Oh! I didn't expect to find you here.<sp:5:0:0> I see
you rushed off ahead of us researchers.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Tauro told me he didn't see you, so I was
worried something might have happened.
Talk_012:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM_01>I'm glad you're all right! I've never seen
lightning strike like that before.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0400>And even stranger, the dragon statues'
eyes seemed to flash just before it. If you
know anything about this, fill us in!
Talk_000:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_01><sp:0:2:2:5000>Calip! Did you see that?! Lightning struck that
dragon pillar too!<sp:0:4:0>Huh? Is someone in those ruins?!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_013:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL_00>Unbelievable...<sp:0:4:0>A mechanism in the ancient ruins got
rid of the thunderclouds and revealed
some new sky islands?
Talk_001:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM_00>Oh! It's you again.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>We think a terrible lightning strike hit
here, but I'm glad to see you weren't hurt.
Talk_200:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Oh, it's you. I see you've found my base
of operations for surveying.
Talk_002:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:TalkPositive>I've never seen lightning strike like that!
And even stranger, the dragon statues'
eyes seemed to glow just before it.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Link, if you know anything about this,
fill us in on what happened!
Talk_201:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>No doubt an amateur ruins enthusiast
like you is curious how that's proceeding.<sp:0:4:0>Sad to say, it's a bit early for that now.
The investigation is still underway.<sp:0:4:0>Even now, I'm hard at work processing
everything I've learned. <sp:5:1:0>NOT resting idly,
as some dullards might believe.
Talk_003:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Great catch! Another amazing discovery
on the books. <sp:5:0:0>In fact, I'd say...
Talk_202: <sp:3:0:2:0c00><sp:0:2:2:5000>Yes... This is my chance to do some solo work.<sp:0:4:0>I'll get results, and with them, recognition at last!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_017:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Sad_00>He wants me to investigate alone? Fieldwork isn't
my strongest suit...<sp:0:4:0>But this may be my chance to make a historic
discovery!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_203:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Not now! Can't you see it's raining?
This is no time for a leisurely chat!
Talk_005:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>It's a significant discovery, to be sure.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>I'd like to go investigate further, but we
have no way of getting up there.
Talk_018:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS_01>Right! <sp:5:1:0>Leave this to me, Tauro. <sp:5:0:0>I'll begin
preparing at once.<sp:0:4:0>I'll need to head back to our base of
operations for a bit first.
Talk_204:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice>Excuse me, but you're standing in the
way of science. Talk to me once I get to
where I'm going, eh?
Talk_006:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Hmm. You're right.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>That doesn't make it any less exciting,
though. We need to report this to Purah
right away.
Talk_205:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>No time now. I must rest and think on
what I've learned. We'll talk tomorrow.
Talk_007:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Calip, I'm going back to Kakariko Village.<sp:0:4:0>I want to write up the recent events
around the floating Ring Ruin in a report
for Purah.<sp:0:4:0>You should stick around here to conduct
a thorough investigation. Find out if there
are any more discoveries to be made!
Talk_206:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice>Please, let me enjoy this lovely morning.
We can chat once I've left my tent to
start the day.
Talk_207:
<snd:Sleep>Zzz... That's right... I found it all...
by myself...
Talk_009:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Yes! Even if we can't get up to the sky,
there's so much to discover on land!<sp:0:4:0>It's our duty to unravel all of it. You can
do this, Calip!
Talk_208:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>The new sky islands you discovered were
an amazing find.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>I'd love to explore them myself, but we
have no way of getting up that high.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01><sp:0:2:2:5000>If only I could fly. <sp:5:1:0>Think of all the research
breakthroughs I could make!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701><sp:0:2:2:6400>Oh yes, what was I saying? <sp:5:0:0>I lost myself
in thought there.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>Since last we met, I've been keeping up
my investigation of the ruins.
